title: Geometric Constraints and Vulnerability in Single-Cell ATAC-seq Immune States: Analysis Pipeline and Data
description: Reproducible computational pipeline for analyzing immune system geometry and critical transitions using single-cell ATAC-seq data. Includes Information Bottleneck implementation, Topological Data Analysis, and vulnerability simulations for robustness assessment. This package contains processed data tables, analysis scripts, and audit logs for full reproducibility.

creators.name: Navarro, Elkin
creators.affiliation: Centro de Investigaciones en Ciencias de la Vida, Universidad Simón Bolívar
